Text:
Totally awesome!
I bought the single CD version so I'm grabbing the second disk. IMHO the guests musicians spoil a perfect album. I guess my hope for another Radio Tisdas-like album is doomed. Tinariwen have become cool and now all these wannabe artists want to play with them /end of rant/ 
(rolls a joint and chills out)
THX a lot, i found this artist on radio during way to work in the Czech Republic it is wonderful music, but difficult to find..
